markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Blessed Ampoule](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1521)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** Your Strike with the affixed weapon hits a target

**Requirement** You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This small glass vial contains a drop of [_holy water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245). When activated, the weapon's physical damage for the Strike becomes good damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blessed Ampoule
requirement: You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
requirement_markdown: You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
